title: ChestCommand配置无效怎么办！！！
author: erry2626
txt_content:
报错：
#------------------- Chest Commands Errors -------------------#] 
1) Invalid YAML configuration for the menu "example2.yml". Please look at the error above, or use an online YAML parser (google is your friend).] 
#---------------------------------------------------------------------#] 配置名字叫example2.yml配置：
menu-settings:
  name: '服务器菜单'
  rows: 4
  command: 'menu'
  open-with-item:
    id: '347:0'
    right-click: true
1:
  ID: 327
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '基础'
2:
  ID: 138
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '回到主城'
  LORE: 
    - '也可以使用指令：'
    - '/spawn'
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  ENCHANTMENT: 'Mending'

3:
  ID: 2
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '领取地皮'
  LORE: 
    - '领取一块地皮！'
    - '仅能领取一块！'
  COMMAND: 'p auto'
4:
  ID: 3
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 1
  NAME: '回到地皮'
  LORE: 
    - '也可以使用指令：'
    - '/p home'
  COMMAND: 'plot home'
10:
  ID: 327
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
  NAME: '传送'
11:
  ID: 161
  DATA-VALUE: 1
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2
  NAME: '前往暮色森林'
  LORE: 
    - '建议通过主城传送！'
  COMMAND: 'op:mv goto DIM-7'
  ENCHANTMENT: 'Mending'
12:
  ID: 267
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
  NAME: '前往石币PVE场'
  LORE: 
    - '建议通过主城传送！'
  COMMAND: 'op:mv goto PVE'
13:
  ID: 328
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2
  NAME: '前往商店'
  LORE: 
    - '前往服务器在线商店'
    - '即将推出……'
  COMMAND: 'open:shop'
14:
  ID: 276
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 2
  NAME: '前往BOSS竞技场'
  LORE: 
    - '即将推出……'
  COMMAND: 'tell:即将推出……'
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  ENCHANTMENT: 'Mending'
19:
  ID: 327
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 3
  NAME: '其他'
20:
  ID: 323
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 3
  NAME: '服务器在线人数：{online}人'
  ENCHANTMENT: 'Mending'
21:
  ID: 323
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 3
  NAME: '当前所在世界：{world}'
  ENCHANTMENT: 'Mending'
36:
  ID: 166
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 4
  NAME: '关闭菜单'

replies.author: Zapic
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Zapic 于 2019-2-25 07:34 编辑 

超长文本请务必折叠!
错误非常明显:
id: '347:0''复制代码
这是一个物品id,在cc里任何物品id都不需要加引号
所以正确的写法应该是这样的:
id: 347:0复制代码

replies.author: RedCarl
replies.txt_content:
你可以试一下https://minechest.cn/
你这应该是代码写的有问题，用软件或者这个写方便一些不易出错

replies.author: 修罗之神
replies.txt_content: 转换为 UIT-8语言 可能是配置文件无法被读取

replies.author: hzc743514984
replies.txt_content: 看一下配置文件是否有问题，推荐使用树形图来制作菜单，如果有需要可以联系我
